text_block_list.text:
After joining the team, Narita Brian's<n>performance doesn't
just stabilize—it<n>gets better and better.

With the Satsuki Sho won, next will be<n>the most celebrated
race in the<n>Twinkle Series, the Tokyo Yushun—the<n>
Japanese Derby.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
After your last race, some are<n>predicting you'll be a Triple
Crown<n>champion! Are you confident you can<n>become the
fifth ever to do it?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I haven't even gotten the second<n>crown in the Japanese
Derby yet.<n>Why bother jumping the gun?

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text:
Racers who didn't participate in the<n>Satsuki Sho will be
running in the<n>Japanese Derby. What's your<n>strategy
against these new rivals?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Strategy? Hmph... All I need to do is<n>get to the finish line
first.

text_block_list.name: Reporter C
text_block_list.text: Brian, please, over here!

text_block_list.name: Reporter D
text_block_list.text: Huh?! Me first, hey Brian!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Just look at the number of<n>journalists.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Everyone's got their eyes on her<n>right now.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
She's in the middle of a five-win<n>streak, with two of them
being G1<n>races. That momentum has taken her<n>straight to
the Japanese Derby.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
When the big day comes, I have no<n>doubt she'll be the
favorite.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
The thing is, high expectations mean<n>one misstep could do
immense<n>damage... like what happened to me.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
How will she face the pressure of<n>being the favorite in such
an important<n>race? It'll be the moment of truth for<n>her.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Let me do one more sprint on the<n>ramped track!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Good idea—go for it!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
The Japanese Derby is 2,400 meters.<n>We've gotta get the
ideal pace into<n>your muscle memory!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: All right, understood!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: The mood on the training course has<n>been so tense lately...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, well it's the Derby!<n>Everybody's desperate for this<n>
once-in-a-lifetime chance.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
That's not all. Heaps of peeps have<n>been watching Brian
train!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: They're all devising ways to beat her.

Her rivals are persistent, and they've<n>all marked Brian as
their target.<n>Winning the Derby's not going to be<n>easy.
Which makes a certain something all<n>the more important...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Hey, Trainer, aren't you gonna get<n>the big announcement
soon?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Right, I'll go check. Everyone keep<n>training.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Right, I'll go check. Everyone keep<n>training.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hey, what's this about?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
They say only the luckiest racer wins<n>the Derby, right? Well,
we're about to<n>find out whether Brian's got the luck.

Brian's good at keeping up with the<n>lead pack in a race. So
it'll be<n>important to get into a good position<n>while
conserving her stamina as much<n>as possible.
And the key to that is having the right<n>starting gate.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: No way...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: No way...

Post eight-seventeen... The farthest<n>from the inside rail, with
the most<n>ground to cover. Luck isn't on<n>Brian's side.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
It's finally the day of the Tokyo<n>Yushun—the Japanese
Derby!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Will the standout favorite Narita Brian<n>take the win? Or will it
be one of her<n>many rivals who've pushed so far to<n>make
it here?

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
You're in perfect shape! Believe in<n>yourself and run with all
you've got!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Okay! When I'm out there, I'll<n>remember all the training I
did!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
A good start is key! Take all the<n>advantages that inside post
has to<n>offer!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
Thank you so much for training me!<n>I'll definitely bring back
first place for<n>you!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
The stands might be roaring with<n>excitement, but the air
back here is<n>tense, huh?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
The stands might be roaring with<n>excitement, but the air
back here is<n>tense, huh?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
You know the Derby's special. Every<n>racer's trained their
heart out to have<n>a shot at glory here.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
You know the Derby's special. Every<n>racer's trained their
heart out to have<n>a shot at glory here.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
And they've been prepped to go up<n>against you specifically.
Plus, you're<n>in the worst starting gate.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
And they've been prepped to go up<n>against you specifically.
Plus, you're<n>in the worst starting gate.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Obviously, winning this is going to be<n>a challenge, so...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Obviously, winning this is going to be<n>a challenge, so...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: So what?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I don't need to worry about any of<n>that. All I need to do is
rip through the<n>pack and win.

Ready or not, the Derby gates open,<n>and I'm reminded once
again...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
They're at the last corner, and Narita<n>Brian's sweeping in
from far outside!<n>Just like that, she's taken the lead!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: She blasts ahead—that's it! Brian<n>wins it!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Narita Brian has her second crown!<n>With an unbelievable
five-length lead,<n>the Satsuki Sho winner has claimed<n>
another amazing victory!
Wooooo!

No matter the opponent, no matter<n>their strategy, no matter
the odds, she<n>still wins!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hey, rockstar! You tore up the<n>competition!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Whooooa! That was better thananyone could have hoped for! AnotherDerby legend is born TODAAAY!
choice_data_list: You just keep on raising the bar, Brian!
You just keep on raising the bar, Brian!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I don't care about other people's<n>expectations. Like I said
before...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
The Derby, the Triple Crown...<n>They're all just stepping
stones.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Um, hey, didn't she just run 2,400<n>meters? Does she
breathe like the<n>rest of us?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Now that you mention it...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Hahaha, you've gotta be kidding me...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Hahaha, you've gotta be kidding me...

I'm her trainer, but even I have no<n>idea what she's really
capable of. I<n>can barely hide how excited that<n>makes me.
